law.catch_line: No provision of this title shall be deemed to be a bar to the applicability of supplementary rights ...
law.text: No provision of this title shall be deemed to be a bar to the applicability of supplementary rights afforded by any public local law enacted by the General Assembly or any ordinance or any local law enacted by any municipality or political subdivision of this State; provided, however, that no such law can diminish or limit any right or remedy granted under the provisions of this title.
